exact_source: Crest Investment Group 3 Ltd (“Crest”) holds a 10% interest in E52/3996, E52/3997 and E52/3780 (“Crest Tenements”) which form part of the Sylvania project tenements. Lighthouse Resources Pty Ltd ("LRH"), a wholly owned subsidiary of Lat66, and Crest have entered into a binding agreement whereby Latitdue 66 will acquire Crest’s 10% interest in the Crest Tenements for cash consideration of A$150,000.
